metadata.title: CVE-2018-4438 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue existed resulting in memory corruption. This was addressedwith improved state management. This issue affected versions prior to iOS12.1.1, tvOS 12.1.1, watchOS 5.1.2, Safari 12.0.2, iTunes 12.9.2 forWindows, iCloud for Windows 7.9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4438` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
